text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

name: ZibMobilityMaintainingPosition
title: zib Mobility.MaintainingPosition
description: Maintaining position is staying in the same position, such as sitting in a chair or standing, when required.
purpose: This Observation resource represents the MaintainingPosition concept (NL-CM:4.3.12) of Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Mobility v3.3 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Mobility-v3.3(2020EN)).

element.comment: This Observation resource represents the MaintainingPosition concept (NL-CM:4.3.12) of zib Mobility. It can be used together with the [zib-Mobility](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.

element.definition: Maintaining position is staying in the same position, such as sitting in a chair or standing, when required.
